`win focus ititle "Kindle for"
`win show ititle "Kindle for"
`win max ititle "Kindle for"
been 2 2
wait 500
setcursor 340 120
`setcursor 800 200
sendmouse left down
wait 500
sendmouse move 0 980
wait 500
sendmouse move 1200 0
wait 200
`sendmouse left up
`sendmouse left click

#mouse offsets
#wait otherwise moves too fast
sendkeypress ctrl+c
clipboard writefile txt.txt

sendkey right press
